name: Golden Match
description:
Golden Match

Join Jane Carter on her adventures in some of the most remote areas of the world as she seeks to uncover hidden treasures, priceless artefacts and stores of ancient knowledge. Fight your way through more and more difficult puzzles, challenge and defeat ancient guardians and become a name of legend among your rival treasure hunters.

Golden Match Gameplay Features:

• More than 200 levels: Follow the path set out by Jane and unlock progress levels, difficult boss stages and optional side levels!
• Match 4 or more of the same symbol each move and unlock extra boosters to help you clear stages faster!
• Defeat Treasure Guardians by collecting all the marbles under tough constraints: You only have a limited amount of moves at your disposal!
• Practice your combo skills early and gain high scores with every step of your journey!

Golden Match is free puzzle game action with all the refined gameplay the match 3 genre is known for. Challenging levels, exciting puzzles in every level and a progression-based ability system will keep you playing for hours on end. Completely for free!
Golden Match will be updated regularly to give you more levels and puzzles!

Visit http://goldenmatch.cervomedia.com for more info!

Follow us for updates and bonuses:
https://www.facebook.com/GoldenMatch/



Golden Match is a free-to-play puzzle game; optional in-game power-ups and items available for purchase.
Minimum iOS version recommended: 8.0
